searchPlaceholderLabel: Search for a customer by first or last name.
singleGroupRestriction: Each customer can only be assigned to one group at a time. To add a customer to a new group, they must first be removed from their current group.
noChangesMade: No changes made. Customer status remains the same.
deleteCustomerDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this customer? This action cannot be undone.
resendFormDescription: Are you sure you want to resend the information form to the customer?
updateCustomerStatusDescription: Set customer status to active or inactive.
recaptchaError: Please complete the reCAPTCHA challenge to send the form.
noClientsYet: You don't have any clients added yet
noClientsYetExplanation: To add a client, click the button at the bottom.
sendFormToCustomerDescription: Send an information form to the customer so they can fill out the information you need. A sample form link is provided below.
noResultsDescription: We couldn't find any clients matching your search or filter criteria. Try adjusting the filters or modifying the search query to find the desired results.
activeCustomerStatusExplanation: Active customers are fully engaged in the system and any operations related to them can be performed.
inactiveCustomerStatusExplanation: Inactive customers are temporarily unavailable in the system, and no operations can be performed with them.
pendingCustomerStatusExplanation: Pending customers are in a transitional state where an information form has been sent to them but has not yet been completed or approved.
sampleFormDescription: This is a sample form showcasing how your clients will see and interact with the information you provide. Use this as a reference to ensure all fields are correctly filled out and aligned with your requirements.
searchAddressPlaceholderNote: Please enter a complete address, including the street name, postal code, and city, for the best match. For example: 'Gedimino pr. 9, 01103, Vilnius'.
noAddressFoundDescription: We couldn't find a match for the address you entered. Please check your spelling, include as much detail as possible (e.g., street name, city, zip code), and try again.
multipleTimeAddressNotFoundDescription: If you've tried multiple times and still can't find your address, click below to see instructions on how to refine your query for the best results.
